ModMetaData.name: Map Edit Tools
ModMetaData.author: Doug
ModMetaData.description:
Continued from https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1796223954
Github link is https://github.com/dougbenham/Rimworld-MapEditTools
Adds new tools that make editing the map easier. To use, just open Architect -> MapTools Tools: Add/remove any roof type Change terrain to any type Instantly smooth floor/walls
